nodes.text: @triglypuff @DMRegister The media keeps promoting this behavior so it won’t stop anytime soon.
Nationally, Democrats and Republicans diverge widely on policing changes. But it's not a clean partisan split: "You have 50 states doing 50 things." https://t.co/VLW53ERV19
@DMRegister It’s amazing how much more smoothly things go if you don’t resist.
